mapper.select: select id, update_time, create_time, username, password, nickname, phone, icon, gender, birthday, integration, status from mms_member inner join (select id from mms_member order by id limit #{start}, #{size}) as tmp using(id)

select id, update_time, create_time, username, password, nickname, phone, icon, gender, birthday, integration, status from mms_member inner join (select id from mms_member where username like concat(#{username}, '%') limit #{start}, #{size}) as tmp using(id)

select id, update_time, create_time, username, password, nickname, phone, icon, gender, birthday, integration, status from mms_member inner join (select id from mms_member where phone like concat(#{phone}, '%') limit #{start}, #{size}) as tmp using(id)
select count(1) from mms_member where username like concat(#{username}, '%')
select count(1) from mms_member where phone like concat(#{phone}, '%')
